availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Alexander Johnson in Edmonson County, Kentucky, on February 27, 1850. Father of Darnel Johnson, Kitty Johnson, Samuel Johnson, Mary E. Johnson, Margaret Johnson, Sarah E. Johnson, Sally Ann Johnson, and John Johnson. Farmer in Butler County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Edmonson County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Butler County, p. 255B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 29.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Butler County, Precinct 4, p. 347B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Butler County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Edmonson County Marriages, Film 001904232.
KYR-0001-020-0541.
